text: Era mithya balara jan'ye guptacarabrtti kare, harama bhaksana kare. Ata'eba, tara yadi apanara kache ase, tabe haya tadera madhye phayasala kare dina, na haya tadera byapare nirlipta thakuna. Yadi tadera theke nirlipta thakena, tabe tadera sadhya ne'i ye, apanara bindumatra ksati karate pare. Yadi phayasala karena, taben'yaya bhabe phayasala karuna. Niscaya allaha subicarakariderake bhalabasena.
